mdRecord.dcterms:description: Weather diary entries. Poll regarding Naked juice, with responses. Reference to Floyd Mayweather Jr. vs. Manny Pacquiao (misspelled in graffiti) boxing match with actual date of fight (5/2/15). [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]

10/1/18 | it's finally fucking sunny outside!! | POLL: is the "Naked" Juice actually healthy? | NO No, but helps with nerve-induced fruit deprivation | NO but OK in moderation NO NO | Here for the Mayweather Paciao fight 5/2/15
